languages.text: Боги варпа откликнулись на призыв Вольного Торговца предложением о сделке. {name} фон Валанциус долж{mf|ен|на} найти способ сотрясти основы Темного города и позволить Хаосу повторно проникнуть в его чрево. В ответ Истина протянет своему слуге руку помощи.

traits.locale_text: Боги варпа откликнулись на призыв Вольного Торговца предложением о сделке. {name} фон Валанциус долж{mf|ен|на} найти способ сотрясти основы Темного города и позволить Хаосу повторно проникнуть в его чрево. В ответ Истина протянет своему слуге руку помощи.

languages.text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.
languages.original_text: Боги варпа откликнулись на призыв Вольного Торговца предложением о сделке. {name} фон Валанциус долж{mf|ен|на} найти способ сотрясти основы Темного города и позволить Хаосу повторно проникнуть в его чрево. В ответ Истина протянет своему слуге руку помощи.

traits.locale_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilize the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

languages.text: Les dieux du Warp ont répondu à l'appel {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et lui ont proposé un marché : {name} von Valancius doit trouver le moyen de déstabiliser la Cité Crépusculaire afin que le Chaos l'envahisse à nouveau. Pour ce faire, la Vérité Primordiale assistera {mf|son fidèle serviteur|sa fidèle servante}.
languages.original_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

traits.locale_text: Les dieux du Warp ont répondu à l'appel {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et lui ont proposé un marché : {name} von Valancius doit trouver le moyen de déstabiliser la Cité Crépusculaire afin que le Chaos l'envahisse à nouveau. Pour ce faire, la Vérité Primordiale assistera {mf|son fidèle serviteur|sa fidèle servante}.

languages.text: 亚空间诸神回应了行商浪人的呼唤，提出了条件。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯必须想办法撕裂破坏黑暗之城，让混沌再次入侵。为了实现这个目标，原初真理将会协助它忠诚的仆人。
languages.original_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间诸神回应了行商浪人的呼唤，提出了条件。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯必须想办法撕裂破坏黑暗之城，让混沌再次入侵。为了实现这个目标，原初真理将会协助它忠诚的仆人。

languages.text: 歪みの神々が自由開拓者の求めに応じ、取引を持ちかけた。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは仄暗き都を不安定なものにし、再び渾沌に侵略させる方法を考え出さねばならない。そのために、原初の真実がその忠実な下僕を助けることになる。
languages.original_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

traits.locale_text: 歪みの神々が自由開拓者の求めに応じ、取引を持ちかけた。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは仄暗き都を不安定なものにし、再び渾沌に侵略させる方法を考え出さねばならない。そのために、原初の真実がその忠実な下僕を助けることになる。

languages.text: Die Warp-Götter haben den Ruf {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erhört. Sie haben {mf|ihm|ihr} einen Handel angeboten: {name} von Valancius muss einen Weg finden, die Dunkle Stadt zu destabilisieren und das Chaos wieder hineinzulassen. Dafür unterstützt die Primordiale Wahrheit {mf|ihren treuen Diener|ihre treue Dienerin}.
languages.original_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

traits.locale_text: Die Warp-Götter haben den Ruf {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erhört. Sie haben {mf|ihm|ihr} einen Handel angeboten: {name} von Valancius muss einen Weg finden, die Dunkle Stadt zu destabilisieren und das Chaos wieder hineinzulassen. Dafür unterstützt die Primordiale Wahrheit {mf|ihren treuen Diener|ihre treue Dienerin}.

languages.text: Los dioses de la disformidad responden a la llamada de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y le ofrecen un trato: {name} von Valancius deberá encontrar la forma de desestabilizar la Ciudad Siniestra y dejar que el Caos la invada otra vez. A cambio, la Verdad Primordial ayudará a su leal sirviente.
languages.original_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.

traits.locale_text: Los dioses de la disformidad responden a la llamada de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y le ofrecen un trato: {name} von Valancius deberá encontrar la forma de desestabilizar la Ciudad Siniestra y dejar que el Caos la invada otra vez. A cambio, la Verdad Primordial ayudará a su leal sirviente.

languages.text: Öteboyut tanrıları, Hür Tacir'in çağrısına cevap verdi. Ona bir anlaşma sundular: {name} von Valancius, Kara Şehir'in dengesini bozmanın bir yolunu bulmalı ve Kaos'un burayı bir kez daha ele geçirmesine izin vermeli. Ezelî Hakikat, bu hususta sadık hizmetkârına yardım edecek.
languages.original_text: The warp gods have answered the Rogue Trader's call. They offered {mf|him|her} a deal: {name} von Valancius must find a way to destabilise the Dark City and let Chaos invade it once again. For that, the Primordial Truth will assist its loyal servant.
